com.embeddedunveiled.serial.bluetooth

Class SerialComBluetoothAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.bluetooth.SerialComBluetoothAdapter

  • public final class SerialComBluetoothAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents the local device Bluetooth adapter and information about it.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerialComBluetoothAdapter(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String bus)
      Construct and allocates a new SerialComBluetoothAdapter object with given details.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dumpDeviceInfo()
      Prints information about this Bluetooth adaptor on console.
      java.lang.String getAddress()
      Returns the hardware address of the local Bluetooth adapter for example "00:11:22:AA:BB:CC".
      java.lang.String getBus()
      Gives information about which bus this device is connected to.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the friendly Bluetooth name of the local Bluetooth adapter.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Returns the type of this device.

      • SerialComBluetoothAdapter

        public SerialComBluetoothAdapter(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String address,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String bus)

        Construct and allocates a new SerialComBluetoothAdapter object with given details.

        Parameters:
        name - friendly name of this adaptor.
        address - bluetooth address.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

        Get the friendly Bluetooth name of the local Bluetooth adapter. This name is visible to remote Bluetooth devices.

        Returns:
        the Bluetooth name or null on error.

      • getAddress

        public java.lang.String getAddress()

        Returns the hardware address of the local Bluetooth adapter for example "00:11:22:AA:BB:CC".

        Returns:
        Bluetooth hardware address as string.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()

        Returns the type of this device.

        Returns:
        the type or null on error.

      • getBus

        public java.lang.String getBus()

        Gives information about which bus this device is connected to.

        Returns:
        bus type.

      • dumpDeviceInfo

        public void dumpDeviceInfo()

        Prints information about this Bluetooth adaptor on console.
